column1: in memory of marlin ""nick"" a. nuechterlein -- cederberg funeral home of frankenmuth| born: january 15
column3: 2015 this memorial provided by:cederberg funeral home of frankenmuth. frankenmuth
column9: 2015 at wellspring lutheran services; age 81 years. marlin was born on january 15
column11: mi to the late elmer and caroline (matzke) nuechterlein. he graduated from arthur hill high school in 1952 and served in the u. s. army from 1954 to 1956. marlin was employed by g. heilman brewery for 38 years until his retirement. he was a lifelong member of st. lorenz lutheran church
column12: and a member of the frankenmuth community band. surviving are; his twin sister
column13: mildred (don) bierlein; nephew dr. steven (connie) bierlein and their sons
column14: zachary and joshua. funeral services will take place on monday
column16: 2015 at 10:15 a. m. at cederberg funeral home of frankenmuth
column17: 590 n. franklin st. and 11:00 a. m. at st. lorenz lutheran church. rev. caleb adams will officiate with burial between services in st. lorenz lutheran cemetery. marlins family will receive visitors at the funeral home on sunday from 3:00 p. m. to 8:00 p. m. and on monday from 9:30 a. m. until the time of service. those planning an expression of sympathy may wish to consider memorials to st. lorenz media ministry.
